category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA113_DWF_by_publish_page_name_mode
preference.preference_description: Defines the naming convention rule followed to name the pages in the DWF files generated via PUBLISH command. This option is taken into consideration only if TCAA113_DWF_generation_mode is set to 1. Possible values: 0 - Page names are in the form <document_name>-<layout_name> (Default) 1 - Page names are in the form <layout_name>
